about_the_game:
Take care of the magical Library Of Lyria. Renovate the old building from a ruin into a wonderful, enchanted place that you fill with new life. Create or find new books, explore the world and take care of your customers.



  • Library Of Lyria is a mixture of sandbox, farm and management sim.
  • Renovate, manage and expand your library. The old building urgently needs some love and attention. Various expansion stages await you to restore the library to its former glory.
  • Collect resources and craft new things. You will need bookshelves and, of course, books. You can either make these yourself, find them on the island of Lyria or ask the villagers to help you. Gradually, you will be able to build increasingly high-quality workbenches and products.
  • Explore the island of Lyria and find out what important purpose the library serves. Because one thing is clear: it's not just a place where books are kept...

On the beautiful island of Lyria there is a Library, a bit hidden in the middle of an enchanted forest, and for generations there has always been a librarian who has taken care of this wonderful building. Knowledge, magic and nature have come together in this place and maintained the balance on the island. Also the villagers of the island have worked closely with the librarian. Until one day the library was left deserted...
You are the next librarian in the succession of generations and restore the library to its former glory.


Renovate, upgrade and expand your library

You start with a building that is very little more than a crumbling forest hut. However, you can expand and embellish your library from level to level. Extensions and upgrades give you more and more opportunities to realize your very own style.

Set up and decorate

A library needs furnishings. Build bookshelves, cozy reading corners and decorate according to your own taste. Turn your own library into a cozy place that people enjoy visiting and spending time in. From level to level, you have more space and more options to furnish everything to your liking.

Extensive and far-reaching stories of the NPCs

The people who live on Lyria have their own stories. Each NPC has a deep background story to explore. Be it their personal fate, goals for the future, inner conflicts or even funny quirks, the closer you get to know the people, the more you will find out about them. Many stories are closely linked to the island of Lyria and open up new quests for you to take on.

Atmospheric and immersive world

The world of Lyria is full of life. The natural beauty of the island creates a friendly and cozy atmosphere that is a pleasure to live in. Nature and magic also play an important role in everyday life. Experience dynamically changing day and night times, changing seasons and a dynamic weather system that lets you dive deep into the world of Lyria. New, undiscovered locations entice you to explore and unlock new areas of the game.

  • Processor: Intel i3 / AMD Ryzen 3
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / AMD R9 390
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 / Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i5 / AMD Ryzen 5
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX960+
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
